---
title: "SPP for IMI"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r}
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
IMI <- read_csv("~/R/SPP/CSV/IMI.csv", col_types = cols(Week = col_date(format = "%Y-%m-%d")))
imi <- ts(IMI[,2], freq=365.25/7, start=2015+51/365.25)
imi %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
plot(decompose(imi))
```

```{r}
training_imi <- subset(imi, end=length(imi)-2)
test_imi <- subset(imi, start=length(imi)-1)
fc_training_imi<-forecast(training_imi)
fc_training_imi %>%
  forecast(h=5) %>%
  autoplot() +autolayer(test_imi)
```

```{r}
fc_training_imi
```

```{r}
fc_imi<-forecast(imi)
fc_imi %>%
forecast(h=30) %>%
  autoplot()
```

```{r}
fc_imi
```
